publications.name: Learning-based Stage Verification System in Manual Assembly Scenarios
publications.publisher: International Conference on Smart and Advanced Manufacturing
publications.summary: Developed and implemented a learning-based stage verification system to improve manual assembly accuracy in industrial scenarios through 1 stereo camera.

publications.name: Attention-Based Learning for 3D Informative Path Planning
publications.publisher: International Conference on Intelligent Robots and Systems (IROS)

publications.name: COMPASS: Cooperative Multi-Agent Persistent Surveillance using Spatio-Temporal Attention Network
publications.summary: An ongoing graduate project developing a novel spatio-temporal attention network for coordinated multi-agent surveillance, demonstrating improved uncertainty reduction, scalability, and robustness.

projects.name: COMPASS: Cooperative Multi-Agent Persistent Surveillance
projects.summary: Developing a spatio-temporal attention network using multi-agent reinforcement learning and Gaussian processes on graph structures for persistent surveillance of dynamic targets.
highlights: Evaluated in simulated environments using AirSim (UE5)

projects.name: Hand-tracking and Object Detection for Verification in Assembly
projects.summary: Integrated an LSTM-based gesture recognition system with a YOLO-based object detection system for stage positioning and error detection during assembly tasks.

projects.name: Collaborative Motion Control of Dual Robots
projects.summary: Implemented real-time trajectory tracking and pose estimation using Cartographer, Kalman filtering, and integrated sensor communication via CAN and I2C for dual-robot coordination.
